seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 11Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Health problems have many complex causes. After mapping the causes of a problem from a specific context (with research, theory & epidemiology), learners will create a proposal with real-world solutions. The proposal will be converted into a persuasive presentation to request funding for the work.
(Prerequisites: ONLY HLTH 207: OPUS also has HLTH 306 listed, but only HLTH 207 is needed. If you wish to enroll and haven't taken HLTH 306, please email Ms. Sadoff ASAP at Shiyra.sadoff@emory.edu for a permission code to enroll).
course_description: Health problems have many complex causes. After mapping the causes of a problem from a specific context (with research, theory & epidemiology), learners will create a proposal with real-world solutions. The proposal will be converted into a persuasive presentation to request funding for the work.
prerequisites: HLTH 207 & HLTH 306 or equivalent transfer credits as prerequisites.
